TopicTitle: Where do I send my apartment building?

Articles.Content:
So I got bored while playing around with B9 Aerospace and wound up building a fully functional apartment building.

(I don't know how to embed albums )

Where should I send it?

. . . a fully functional apartment building.

If it doesn't have this mod, then your claim is fallacious.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45033-Kerbal-Plumbing-Corp-External-Commode-Seat

Edited August 22, 2013 by DChurchill
Forgot link.

I'd suggest landing it somewhere not too far from KSC, then it can be a place where tired and space weary astronauts can take a short plane ride to and kick back and relax. I did something very similar, also inspired by and primarily constructed out of B9 parts. I landed my house about 60km from KSC on the coast so Jeb, Bob and Bill had a place to chill out in, but was easy enough to get them back from when they were needed.
Oh just wow.... that is so going in my next base design... THE command seat.

place it on eeloo!

to house all those karbels that after stranding on eeloo realise that they don't have enough fuel to ever make it back!
This makes me think a suitable addition to KSC may be an apartment building for the employees. Anyway, that looks good. What's the inside look like?
